attributes.action: GIVE THE BRITISH PUBLIC A REFORENDUM ON STAYING IN THE E.U.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir,
It is increasingly apparent that membership of The EU is detremental to the UK Economy.
Examples of this include - Decimation of The Fishing Industry.
Unaffordable EU Immigration.
Minimum working wage for the above.
British Government From Brussels.
85% of jobs go to EU immigrants.

This surely cannot continue like this can it ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
